activities: Securimate licenses subscription-based access to its third party management software to various entities globally. The third party management software provides for uploading,secure storage and access by authorized Securimate Users of due diligence related information on entities and principals located within and without the EU. Securimate acts as a data processor on behalf of its clients, who use the software to manage their regulatory compliance due diligence caseloads.  Before starting processing on behalf of a Securimate client, Securimate will enter into a processing contract with the EU data controller responsible for the personal information pursuant to the applicable EU Member State Data Protection law.  The processing contract ensures that the EU data controller will be in compliance with the Member State Data Protection law.  Any data processed by Securimate will not be further disclosed to third parties except where permitted or required by the processing contract, EU Safe Harbor or the applicable Member State Data Protection law.  Securimate has no EU-based employees and does not receive Human Resources data from the EU.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
